description: Independent research is offered for students dedicated to an in-depth research experience. Emphasis is placed on the iterative process of research, through experimentation, theorizing, and/or computation followed by analysis and further questioning. Students interested in independent research may enroll in PHYS 297 or PHYS 398. Each course requires a faculty supervisor. Prerequisite: approval of instructor.
name: Independent Research (.25, .5, 1.0)
title: Independent Research
